Class saveManager

java.lang.Object
classes.saveManager
public class saveManager extends Object
A class to manage save files by doing read/write operations on them.

This class provides the necessary methods for saving the game, loading a game, and creating a new game. It also includes a method for reviving a deceased pet. It stores 3 slots for saves, each having a fixed file directory.

Version:
1.1
Author:
Everett Guyea

  • Method Details

    • getSave

      public save getSave(int saveNum)
      Parameters:
      saveNum - The number of the save file being requested (1-3).
      Returns:
      The respective save file.

    • getMenuData

      public String[] getMenuData(int saveNum)
      Returns pet type and pet name

      Example: {"John Doe", "0"} - 0 Corresponds to 'Shark' (Check Number Correspondence for Type of Pet Documentation). If save file DNE or is empty, returns null.

      Parameters:
      saveNum - A number representing the specified save file (1 - 3).
      Returns:
      A string array containing (in order) the pets name and type number.

    • setSave

      public boolean setSave(int saveNum, save saveData)
      Method for assigning a save object to one of the three saves in the classes.saveManager and creating its save file ('saves/save_#.json').
      Parameters:
      saveNum - A number representing the specified save file (1 - 3).
      saveData - A save object containing the data to be saved.
      Returns:
      A boolean value that is true if the save was successful and false otherwise.

    • revivePet

      public boolean revivePet(int saveNum)
      Method for reviving a deceased pet
      Parameters:
      saveNum - A number representing the specified save file (1 - 3).
      Returns:
      A boolean value that is true if the pet is revived, and false if it was not.

    • getGameInstance

      public GameInstance getGameInstance(int saveNum)
      Method for creating a gameInstance object out of a save file.
      Parameters:
      saveNum - An integer representing which save slot to access (1 - 3).
      Returns:
      A gameInstance object constructed with the data from a save slot.

    • saveGameInstance

      public void saveGameInstance(int saveNum, GameInstance gameInstance)
      Method for saving a gameInstance object.
      Parameters:
      saveNum - An integer representing which save slot to access (1 - 3).
      gameInstance - A gameInstance object that will be saved.

    • PCMaker

      public boolean PCMaker(parentalControls parentalControls)
      A method to create a save file in 'saves/parental_controls.json' containing the parental controls settings.
      Parameters:
      parentalControls - The parentalControls object that will be saved.
      Returns:
      A boolean value that is true if the save was successful and false otherwise.

    • PCReader

      public parentalControls PCReader()
      A method to read the parental controls save file at 'saves/parental_controls.json'.
      Returns:
      A parentalControls object generated with the saved settings.
